original_text: 'they' begins and ends with scenes so terrifying i'm still stunned . and i've decided to leave a light on every night from now on .
generated_text:
1. "I just watched 'The Shining' and I'm still shaking. The way it builds up to the climax is masterful. I'll never look at hotel rooms the same way again."
2. "I'm still reeling from the intense scenes in 'The Exorcist'. The way it explores the supernatural is chilling. I'll be sleeping with the lights on from now on."
3. "The jump scares in 'Halloween' got me every time. The way it uses tension and suspense is genius. I'm a fan of Michael Myers now."
4. "I just finished watching 'The Conjuring' and I'm still trying to process what I saw. The way it blends horror and drama is incredible. I'll be thinking about it for weeks."
